page.title: 13WEST PENWITH GUN CLUB
page.content: The club has been in existance for 10 years.It is the only club of international and olympic status S.W. of Dorset and holds international competitions with many visitors from abroad.It is a privately owned club leasing a 4.75 acre site.There is Â£11,000 worth of equipment.180,000 clay pigeons and 120,000 12 bore cartridges are used each year. There are 120 members,including 3 international champions and one European champion.There are a few women members and the youngest member is 11 years old.The membership costs Â£7.00 pounds per year. The club will close next year because the landowner wants the land for farming again.It will then move to Devon. The guns used can cost from Â£150 to Â£6,500.
